aquarium

Interface Observable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    TemperatureSensor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TestTemperatureSensor

    public interface Observable
    The Observable interface is used for objects that can notify a series of Observer objects that are registered with the Observable object of events that are of interest to the observers.
    Version:
    Jul 27, 2016

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addObserver(java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Double,java.lang.Void> anObserver)
      Add a lambda function as an observer to this Observable object.
      void removeObserver(java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Double,java.lang.Void> anObserver)
      Remove an observer from the set of observers to be notified.

    • Method Detail

      • addObserver

        void addObserver(java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Double,java.lang.Void> anObserver)
        Add a lambda function as an observer to this Observable object.
        Parameters:
        anObserver - the function to excecute when the Observable object wants to report an event.

      • removeObserver

        void removeObserver(java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Double,java.lang.Void> anObserver)
        Remove an observer from the set of observers to be notified.
        Parameters:
        anObserver - the observer function to remove.
